item.title: php page
item.description: How to run php script it may contain .php, .ini, .css to start with download xampp put folder with php under htdocs at path ../xampp/htdocs/ur_folder open control panel and start apache and mysql find the php at localhost/ur_folder_name

item.title: transfer OS to new ssd/hdd
item.description: How to transfer OS from 1 computer to another Prepare empty HDD/SSD Download https://tw.easeus.com/backup-recovery/migrate-windows-10-to-ssd.html Follow instruction in step 2 HDD/SSD must be bigger than actual physical size of disk that is being replicated eg. ur physical disk is splited into C drive(512G) and D drive(512G) then a HDD/SSD of 1T is required even though C and D drive is virtually different or you can delete D drive (delete volumn/partition) via disk manager in Windows giving a 512G of C drive and unallocated 512G of nothing Perform actual copying action Boot with new disk and check window is working fine If you want to reset Windows, check that all user content you wish to preserve is copied out else, after resetting, new user may not access the folders as it have no permission granted as the the permission still belongs to the original user(the one before you reset) If step 7 is done but files are not accessible, read up on https://answers.

item.title: Setup SSR
item.description: Setup up gcp 沒特別標明的選項就是用default google gcp open gcp account 去主控台 主控台 在Computer Engine 裡 創一個 VM 執行個體 建立VM 執行個體 選個地方 (區域: 台灣

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo My folder structure . ├── blog └── resources how to create new page $ ./blog hugo new [page_name].md start server $ ./blog hugo server push public files $ ./blog/public git... reference https://mogeko.me/2018/018/ draft 要改成false才會publish to public 每次回到根目錄./blog

item.title: markdown
